Description:
Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Powershell Token Obfuscation - Process Creation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command re '\w+`(\w+|-|.)`[\w+|\s]' and command re '"(\{\d\})+"\s*-f' and command re '(?i)\$\{`?e`?n`?v`?:`?p`?a`?t`?h`?\}') and  not command like '%${env:path}%')
